depositContent: SwapAll is a Layer 2 Dex. Transfering assets from your decentralized wallet (Layer 1) to SwapAll Layer 2 wallet to experience gas-free and real-time token transfer and swap. In SwapAll Layer 2, your assets are managed by a group of decentralized smart contracts. You and only you have total control over the assets through private keys. Your assets are safe, and you could be able to withdraw assets to your Layer 1 wallet any time.
rewardContent: If you meet the requirements for claiming SATO airdrop awards, you can click the button below to register for receiving SATO rewards from April 5 to April 25, 2021 (UTC time). You need to use the same wallet address that meets the requirements to connect. In order to ensure that the users who registered early can receive the airdrop rewards as soon as possible in order to participate in SATO liquidity mining, the rewards will be distributed in two rounds.
rewardContent3: Firstly, Users who have successfully registered before 13:00 (UTC) on April 14 can receive SATO airdrop rewards (a total of 300,000 tokens) before 21:00 (UTC) on April 14. On the other hand, starting from 13:00 (UTC) April 14, the number of SATO tokens that are going to be distributed per user will no longer change by the number of newly registered users. Users who successfully register after 13:00 (UTC) on April 14 will receive rewards (a total of 200,000 tokens) before 21:00 (UTC) on April 25 until all tokens are completely distributed. If there are not enough people claim the remaining airdrops, they will be distributed evenly to all registered users who qualified for the airdrop.
registerRewardFailedContent: Sorry, the wallet address you are using is not qualified for SATO airdrop reward. Thank you for your participation.
NotAvailable: SATO airdrop reward claim is not open yet. Please come back at 13:00 April 5 (UTC).
withdrawContent: You can withdraw your assets from SwapAll Layer 2 to your decentralized wallet (Layer 1) any time. The default address is the address of your wallet that connected to this site. You can also withdraw to other Layer 1 addresses. Please make sure the address is correct. Once submitted, it cannot be canceled.
enterAmountHigherThanFee: Enter an amount higher than fee
wrongNetworkContent: Please switch to ETH or HECO mainnet
notSent: Please check your input and try again
unCaught: Unknown error. Please try again later
withdrawNotAvailable: Withdraw is temporarily closed. Please try again later
intercepted: Service is under maintenance, please try again later
airdropping: Airdrop in action, please try again later
tooFrequent: Operate too frequently, please try again later
lessThanMin: Withdraw request failed to send: amount requested is lower than minimum withdraw requirement
overLimit: The amount of the coin you deposit or transfer has exceeded your daily limit. Please try a smaller amount or come back tomorrow.
noDepositBeforeWithdraw: Can't withdraw if you haven't deposited at least once
